course.subject: BIEN
course.name: Regulatory Affairs in the Healthcare Industry
course.description: This course aims to introduce basic concepts of regulatory science, while familiarizing students with product development, manufacturing, medical and engineering operations, and quality control / quality assurance processes in the pharmaceutical and medical device industry. Students will also be introduced to the associated regulatory requirements, with an emphasis on Hong Kong, Great Bay Area, China and beyond, in topics such as Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP), pharmaceutical product registration, pharmacovigilance, and clinical trials.
